      • addSong

        public java.lang.String addSong(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String releaseDate,
                                java.lang.String artistName,
                                int duration,
                                model.GenreSong genre,
                                java.lang.String author)
        This method adds a Song.
        Pre:The array songs[] must be already created
        Pos:The song has been created correctly
        Parameters:
        title - , is the title of the song, title!=null and title!="";
        releaseDate - , is the date when the song had been released, releaseDate!=null and releaseDate!="".
        artistName - , is the name of the artist of the song, artistName!=null and artistName!="".
        duration - is the duration of the song, duration!=null and duration>0.
        genre - is the genre of the song, genre!=null.
        author - is the name of the author, author!=null and author!="".
        Returns:
        message, a String that shows if it was possible to create the song or not.
